00031 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( DataSetUpdaterTest );

00033 #define TEST_FILE "data_file.datasetupdater_test"
00034 
00035 void DataSetUpdaterTest::setUp()
00036 {
00037 }
00038 
00039 void DataSetUpdaterTest::CreateReferenceFile()
00040 {
00041         // Create the data object.
00042         GenericData data;
00043         data.Header().SetFilename(TEST_FILE);
00044 
00045         DataGroupHeader dgHdr(L"data");
00046         DataSetHeader dsHdr;
00047 
00048         dsHdr.SetName(L"test");
00049         dsHdr.AddAsciiColumn(L"string8", 64);
00050         dsHdr.AddUnicodeColumn(L"string16", 64);
00051         dsHdr.AddByteColumn(L"int8");
00052         dsHdr.AddShortColumn(L"int16");
00053         dsHdr.AddIntColumn(L"int32");
00054         dsHdr.AddUByteColumn(L"uint8");
00055         dsHdr.AddUShortColumn(L"uint16");
00056         dsHdr.AddUIntColumn(L"uint32");
00057         dsHdr.AddFloatColumn(L"float");
00058         dsHdr.SetRowCnt(3);
00059 
00060         dgHdr.AddDataSetHdr(dsHdr);
00061 
00062         data.Header().AddDataGroupHdr(dgHdr);
00063         data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->SetFileTypeId("affymetrix.test.data");
00064 
00065 
00066 
00067         // Write the data object to the file
00068         GenericFileWriter writer(&data.Header());
00069         writer.WriteHeader();
00070 
00071         DataGroupWriter &dataGroupWriter = writer.GetDataGroupWriter(0);
00072         dataGroupWriter.WriteHeader();
00073 
00074         //int iSet=0;
00075         DataSetWriterIt beginSet;
00076         DataSetWriterIt endSet;
00077         dataGroupWriter.GetDataSetWriters(beginSet, endSet);
00078 
00079         beginSet->WriteHeader();
00080 
00081         int32_t dataSetSz = beginSet->GetDataSetSize();
00082         int32_t offset = writer.GetFilePos();
00083         writer.SeekFromCurrentPos(dataSetSz + 1);
00084         beginSet->UpdateNextDataSetOffset();
00085 
00086         dataGroupWriter.UpdateNextDataGroupPos();
00087         
00088         writer.SeekFromBeginPos(offset);
00089 
00090 
00091         // Write the data.
00092         beginSet->Write("first_row", 64);
00093         beginSet->Write(L"first_row", 64);
00094         beginSet->Write((int8_t) 1);
00095         beginSet->Write((int16_t) 1);
00096         beginSet->Write((int32_t) 1);
00097         beginSet->Write((u_int8_t) 1);
00098         beginSet->Write((u_int16_t) 1);
00099         beginSet->Write((u_int32_t) 1);
00100         beginSet->Write(1.0f);
00101 
00102         beginSet->Write("second_row", 64);
00103         beginSet->Write(L"second_row", 64);
00104         beginSet->Write((int8_t) 2);
00105         beginSet->Write((int16_t) 2);
00106         beginSet->Write((int32_t) 2);
00107         beginSet->Write((u_int8_t) 2);
00108         beginSet->Write((u_int16_t) 2);
00109         beginSet->Write((u_int32_t) 2);
00110         beginSet->Write(2.0f);
00111 
00112         beginSet->Write("third_row", 64);
00113         beginSet->Write(L"third_row", 64);
00114         beginSet->Write((int8_t) 3);
00115         beginSet->Write((int16_t) 3);
00116         beginSet->Write((int32_t) 3);
00117         beginSet->Write((u_int8_t) 3);
00118         beginSet->Write((u_int16_t) 3);
00119         beginSet->Write((u_int32_t) 3);
00120         beginSet->Write(3.0f);
00121 }

00127 void DataSetUpdaterTest::testUpdateFail()
00128 {
00129         DataSetUpdater u;
00130         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(u.Initialize("no_file"), FileNotFoundException);
00131         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(u.Initialize("../../parsers/data/test.file.full_array_file"), InvalidFileTypeException);
00132 }
00133 
00134 typedef struct _RowDataType
00135 {
00136         string str;
00137         wstring wstr;
00138         int8_t b;
00139         int16_t s;
00140         int32_t i;
00141         u_int8_t ub;
00142         u_int16_t us;
00143         u_int32_t ui;
00144         float f;
00145 } RowDataType;
00146 
00147 void GetRow(int row, RowDataType &d)
00148 {
00149         GenericData data;
00150         GenericFileReader reader;
00151         reader.SetFilename(TEST_FILE);
00152         reader.Open(data);
00153 
00154         DataSet *set = data.DataSet(0, 0);
00155         set->Open();
00156 
00157         set->GetData(row, 0, d.str);
00158         set->GetData(row, 1, d.wstr);
00159         set->GetData(row, 2, d.b);
00160         set->GetData(row, 3, d.s);
00161         set->GetData(row, 4, d.i);
00162         set->GetData(row, 5, d.ub);
00163         set->GetData(row, 6, d.us);
00164         set->GetData(row, 7, d.ui);
00165         set->GetData(row, 8, d.f);
00166 
00167         set->Close();
00168         set->Delete();
00169 }
00170 
00171 void DataSetUpdaterTest::testUpdateInt8()
00172 {
00173         CreateReferenceFile();
00174         DataSetUpdater upd;
00175         upd.Initialize(TEST_FILE);
00176         int8_t newval = 12;
00177         upd.Update(0, 0, 2, 2, newval);
00178         newval = 22;
00179         upd.Update(0, 0, 1, 2, newval);
00180 
00181         RowDataType data;
00182         GetRow(2, data);
00183         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.b == 12);
00184         GetRow(1, data);
00185         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.b == 22);
00186 }

00222 void DataSetUpdaterTest::testUpdateUInt8()
00223 {
00224         CreateReferenceFile();
00225         DataSetUpdater upd;
00226         upd.Initialize(TEST_FILE);
00227         u_int8_t newval = 12;
00228         int row=2;
00229         int col=5;
00230         upd.Update(0, 0, row, col, newval);
00231

00235 }

00267 void DataSetUpdaterTest::testUpdateFloat()
00268 {
00269         CreateReferenceFile();
00270         DataSetUpdater upd;
00271         upd.Initialize(TEST_FILE);
00272         upd.Update(0, 0, 2, 8, 12.0f);
00273         upd.Update(0, 0, 0, 8, 22.0f);
00274 
00275         RowDataType data;
00276         GetRow(0, data);
00277         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(data.f, 22.0f, 0.000001f);
00278         GetRow(2, data);
00279         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(data.f, 12.0f, 0.000001f);
00280 }
00281 
00282 void DataSetUpdaterTest::testUpdateString8()
00283 {
00284         CreateReferenceFile();
00285         DataSetUpdater upd;
00286         upd.Initialize(TEST_FILE);
00287         upd.Update(0,0,1,0,"newval");
00288         upd.Update(0,0,0,0,"another_value");
00289         upd.Update(0,0,2,0,"1");
00290         RowDataType data;
00291         GetRow(1, data);
00292         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.str == "newval");
00293         GetRow(0, data);
00294         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.str == "another_value");
00295         GetRow(2, data);
00296         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.str == "1");
00297 }

00299 void DataSetUpdaterTest::testUpdateString16()
00300 {
00301         CreateReferenceFile();
00302         DataSetUpdater upd;
00303         upd.Initialize(TEST_FILE);
00304         upd.Update(0,0,1,1,L"newval");
00305         upd.Update(0,0,0,1,L"one");
00306         upd.Update(0,0,2,1,L"two");
00307         RowDataType data;
00308         GetRow(0, data);
00309         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.wstr == L"one");
00310         GetRow(1, data);
00311         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.wstr == L"newval");
00312         GetRow(2, data);
00313         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.wstr == L"two");
00314 }
